title: Personal website
description: This is my personal website, made in NextJS, TypeScript and TailwindCSS. On this site, I can showcase my projects and introduce myself to those who are interested.

title: Calendar App
description: A calendar application built in Java with JavaFX. The application allows for adding single or recurring events, as well as todo-items.

title: Stonks 2.0
description: The second iteration of a hobby project where you can analyze stocks over a given time period using a backtesting library. Among other things, the program provides a visual representation of how different trading strategies work on a given stock over a given time period.

title: Vehicle Weight Lifting
description: A Roblox game built using Luau. The objective of the game involves racking up strength and battling with other players.
